Name: Cheese Fries
Description: French fries and cheese, what more could you ask for?

NameLocalization.ja: チーズフライドポテト

DescriptionLocalization.es: Papas fritas y queso, ¿qué mas se podría pedir?
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 감자 튀김과 치즈, 뭘 더 바라겠어요?
DescriptionLocalization.de: Pommes und Käse, was will man mehr?
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Frites avec du fromage, que demander de mieux ?
DescriptionLocalization.ja: フライドポテトにチーズ、他に何か必要ですか？
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Batatas fritas e queijo, o que mais você poderia querer?
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 法式炸薯条和奶酪，你还能奢求什么？
